articles.author: Hollie Silverman, Eric Fiegel and Nicole Chavez, CNN
articles.title: FBI investigating 'crude noose' found in Black firefighter's locker in Minnesota
articles.description: The FBI has launched an investigation after a piece of rope resembling a noose was found in the locker of a Black firefighter in a suburb of Minneapolis.

articles.author: Alaa Elassar, CNN
articles.title: NBA star Kevin Love is donating $500,000 to UCLA for anxiety and depression research
articles.description: Kevin Love is using his All-Star power to support and advocate for stronger mental health research. The Cleveland Cavaliers forward has committed $500,000 to UCLA's psychology department to aid in mental health research, the university said.

articles.author: Jason Hoffman, Donald Judd and Sam Fossum, CNN
articles.title: Trump campaign postpones Pence's campaign events in Florida and Arizona
articles.description: The Trump campaign has postponed Vice President Mike Pence's campaign events in Florida and Arizona next week "out of an abundance of caution," a campaign spokesperson told CNN.

articles.author: Jason Hoffman, Donald Judd and Sam Fossum, CNN
articles.title: Trump campaign postpones Pence's campaign events in Florida and Arizona
articles.description: The Trump campaign has postponed Vice President Mike Pence's campaign events in Florida and Arizona next week "out of an abundance of caution," a campaign spokesperson told CNN.

articles.author: Kay Jones and James Froio, CNN
articles.title: Mississippi House starts process to change state's flag
articles.description: The Mississippi State House passed a resolution on Saturday that will begin the process to change the state's flag.

articles.author: Hollie Silverman, Eric Fiegel and Nicole Chavez, CNN
articles.title: FBI investigating apparent noose found in Black firefighter's locker in Minnesota
articles.description: The FBI has launched an investigation after a piece of rope resembling a noose was found in the locker of a Black firefighter in a suburb of Minneapolis.

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: NY Times: Trump told in March that Russia offered bounties for US troops in Afghanistan
articles.description: US intelligence concluded months ago that Russian military intelligence offered bounties to Taliban-linked militants to kill coalition forces in Afghanistan, including US troops, amid peace talks, according to a New York Times report published Friday.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: New York is lighting up iconic landmarks to celebrate the 50th anniversary of Pride
articles.description: New York will light up several major landmarks across the state in the colors of the Pride flag to celebrate Pride weekend.

articles.author: Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: Mike Henry will no longer voice Cleveland on 'Family Guy'
articles.description: Mike Henry has stepped down from playing the character Cleveland on "Family Guy," the latest in a slew of White actors abdicating roles voicing animated characters of color.
articles.content: It's been an honor to play Cleveland on Family Guy for 20 years. I love this character, but persons of color should play characters of color. Therefore, I will be stepping down from the role. pic.twi… [+62 chars]

articles.author: Ravi Ubha, CNN
articles.title: Barcelona's title hopes dim after a draw at Celta Vigo
articles.description: Real Madrid took a firm grip on the title race in Spain's La Liga without even playing after archrival Barcelona dropped two points at Celta Vigo despite Luis Suarez's double.

articles.author: Hollie Silverman and Ray Sanchez, CNN
articles.title: About 170 Atlanta officers called out sick after cops were charged in Rayshard Brooks' death
articles.description: About 170 Atlanta police officers called out sick in the days after a pair of city cops were charged in the shooting death of Rayshard Brooks, according to police roll call worksheets.

articles.description: People in East Lansing, Michigan, are being asked to self-quarantine because roughly 85 people contracted Covid-19 after visiting a restaurant this month, a health official says.

articles.author: Steve Forrest and Jason Hanna, CNN
articles.title: New York's St. Patrick's Cathedral is about to hold its first public Mass since March
articles.description: New York City's St. Patrick's Cathedral on Sunday will hold its first public Mass since March, when it stopped in-person attendance during the coronavirus pandemic.

articles.author: Kevin Bohn and Ryan Browne, CNN
articles.title: US fighter jets again intercept Russian military aircraft near Russia
articles.description: US F-22 fighter jets intercepted four Russian Tu-142 reconnaissance aircraft Saturday entering the Alaskan Air Defense Identification Zone (ADIZ), NORAD said in a statement.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: What Cuomo wants Trump to admit about coronavirus
articles.description: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo wanted to make a very simple point when we talked Friday afternoon: The Democrat's theory of how to slow the coronavirus pandemic had succeeded while President Donald Trump's theory had failed.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!
